reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Support to children with disabilities and their families (Razam/Together)
Tuki vammaisille lapsille ja heidan perheilleen (Razam/Together)

description.narrative: Hankkeella tarjotaan vammaisille lapsille ja nuorille yhteinen inklusiivinen tila jossa he voivat viettaa aikaa yhdessa sisarustensa ja naapuruston muiden lasten kanssa. Perheille tarjotaan lastenhoitopalvelu seka psykologista tukea ja kursseja.Hankkeen ta voite on tukea perheita ja vahvistaa kommunikaatiota vammaisten lasten ja nuorten kesken seka naapuruston asukkaiden valilla seka edistaa eri tavoin inklusiivista kulttuuria Brestin kaupungissa.

The project provides children and young people with disabilities an inclusive space where they can spend time together with their siblings and other children from the neighborhood. Families will be offered a childcare service and psychological support and trainings.The project's aim is to support families and strengthen communication among children and young people with disabilities and with other people from the neighborhood and to promote an inclusive culture in the city of Brest.
